text:
Rain in College Park,
at least it's better than snow,
I miss the sunshine

After a long day,
I play my favorite songs,
to avoid homework

Time to go skiing,
it's snowy, icy and cold
black diamond weather :)

Me-ow me-ow... purr
robocats still sound like cats,
but feel like metal

I have four arms... huh?,
I look even more awesome?
my sword is awesome
